Name: Looking Familiar
About the game: Looking Familiar is a fantasy, adventure text based game about medieval relationship story on ADRIFT game engine with multiple endings. Play your hero who was put in the dungeon and find your love - the princess by performing main quest. In game you can explore world, ask questions, pick up objects, examine them and open doors like in old text based games by using commands on your keyboard. You can also save and load game where you want. The game contain : Main quest with multiple solution, few implemented commands which player can use in the world of the game - City of Interloft.
